meanings.sent1: Her starting of the race was filled with excitement.
meanings.sent2: The starting of a new project can be both thrilling and daunting.
meanings.sent3: The starting of the party was delayed due to a missing cake.
meanings.sent4: His starting of the speech captivated the audience from the first word.
meanings.sent5: The starting of a journey often brings a mix of emotions.

meanings.definition: The point in time or space at which something begins.
meanings.sent1: The starting of the movie was right on time.
meanings.sent2: At the starting of the trail, there was a sign with directions.
meanings.sent3: The starting of the concert was marked by a burst of confetti.
meanings.sent4: The starting of the meeting was delayed due to technical difficulties.
meanings.sent5: The starting of a new day brings endless possibilities.

meanings.sent1: The starting line of the race was clearly marked.
meanings.sent2: The starting date of the event is next Monday.
meanings.sent3: The starting point of the maze was challenging to find.
meanings.sent4: The starting position in the game gave her an advantage.
meanings.sent5: The starting location of the treasure hunt was a mystery to all.
